encoder.name: Bitwise XOR Challenge encoder
encoder.author: Thomas Shaw
encoder.description: Binary bitwise XOR operation module. Takes a string input, generates a random bitstream of equal length., XOR's the 2 strings, outputs the binary streams joined with an underscore.
encoder.hint: Perform a bitwise XOR on both strings - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YtghBxoBxpA
encoder.solution: Example bitwise XOR tool: http://www.mobilefish.com/services/big_number_bitwise_calculation/big_number_bitwise_calculation.php Decode the result into it's ASCII representation.
